subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Steven Stamkos scored two late goals, giving him a N.H.L.-best 58 this season, and the host Tampa Bay Lightning handed the playoff-hopeful Washington Capitals a damaging 4-2 loss.
snippet: Steven Stamkos scored two late goals, giving him a N.H.L.-best 58 this season, and the host Tampa Bay Lightning handed the playoff-hopeful Washington Capitals a damaging 4-2 loss.
